Cerberus/NightBlade/Dachande:

     NightBlade walked by the cave Cerberus was hiding in, Cerberus 
stepped out. "Greetings, little one. My name is Cerberus."
     "Hey, you kinda look like...Tom Selek," NightBlade said.
     "Umm..yes, that's nice," Carberus said. "In anycase I am 
offering you a position in my Coalition. Right now my main goal is to 
assassinate Magmatron, the leader of the Destrons."
     "I've heard of him," NightBlade said, she liked Cerberus, he 
seemed a good leader. She would aid him as long as it was 
useful. "I'm in, does it matter that I'm a....(She thought about the 
three factions she knew about and choose)a Maximal?"
     "Not to me," Cerberus said. "We are a coalition, anybody can 
join as long as they don't want Magmatron alive."

     Dachande jumped from a tree and decloaked then. "You want to 
destroy Magmatron?"
     "Yes, do you?" Cerberus replied.
     "Good," Dachande said. 
     "I know you, your Dachande, right?" Cerberus said.
     "Yes, I am," Dachande said.
     "What happened to you?" Cerberus said, "You seem to have no 
beast mode."
     "I've had a change," Dachande said, eyes glowing. "For the 
better."
     "Nice to meet you," NightBlade said.
     "I'm sure it is," Dachande said smugly. "If you'll excuse me, 
I'm going to find someone."
     He turned and walked away, fading into cloak as he did.


Magmatron:

     "The rest of you," Magmatron said to th remaining troops. "Get 
whatever you need now, we will reconvien in three hours and discuss a 
base to attack."
     Magmatron left the office and went into his private room, nobody 
could enter without asking permission first. He commed 
Guiledart, "You have 1/2 and hour to have a report on your progress 
of the machine to be on my desk." He closed the comm.
     He turned to look at a screen, it was of NightBlade's optics, 
for the bug he had installed on her accesssed her optics and hearing. 
He heard the entire conversation.
     "Hmmm....so, Cerberus had recruited Dachande and NightBlade into 
his little quest, goodie goodie."
